pli-tv-pvr6:1.1.eng: “I will ask about the full ordination, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:
pli-tv-pvr6:1.1.comm: It is noteworthy that it is not called the Great Chapter. “Full Ordination” is close to what this chapter is called in other schools, that is, “going forth”.

pli-tv-pvr6:1.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?
pli-tv-pvr6:1.2.comm: It is noteworthy that although the Pali reads kati āpattiyo, “How many offenses?”, the answer makes it clear that this is about the number of classes of offenses. I translate accordingly.

pli-tv-pvr6:1.3.eng: I will answer about the full ordination, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:1.4.eng: two offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:1.4.comm: SP 4.320: Dve āpattiyoti ūnavīsativassaṁ upasampādentassa pācittiyaṁ, sesesu sabbapadesu dukkaṭaṁ, “Two offenses: there is an offense entailing confession for one ordaining a person less than twenty years old. There is an offense of wrong conduct in regard to all the other clauses.” In the following cases, I will just note the classes of offenses that are mentioned in the commentary.

pli-tv-pvr6:2.1.eng: I will ask about the observance day, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:2.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:2.3.eng: I will answer about the observance day, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:2.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:2.4.comm: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:3.1.eng: I will ask about entering the rainy-season residence, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:3.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:3.3.eng: I will answer about entering the rainy-season residence, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:3.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:4.1.eng: I will ask about the invitation ceremony, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:4.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:4.3.eng: I will answer about the invitation ceremony, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:4.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:4.4.comm: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:5.1.eng: I will ask about that which is connected with skins, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:5.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:5.3.eng: I will answer about that which is connected with skins, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:5.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:5.4.comm: The offense entailing confession, the serious offense, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:6.1.eng: I will ask about medicines, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:6.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:6.3.eng: I will answer about medicines, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:6.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:6.4.comm: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:7.1.eng: I will ask about the robe-making ceremony, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:
pli-tv-pvr6:7.1.comm: For a discussion of the word kathina, see Appendix of Technical Terms.

pli-tv-pvr6:7.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:7.3.eng: I will answer about the robe-making ceremony, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:7.4.eng: there is no offense laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:8.1.eng: I will ask about that which is connected with robes, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:8.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:8.3.eng: I will answer about that which is connected with robes, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:8.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:8.4.comm: The serious offense, the offense entailing relinquishment and confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:9.1.eng: I will ask about that which is connected with Campā, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:9.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:9.3.eng: I will answer about that which is connected with Campā, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:9.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:10.1.eng: I will ask about that which is connected with Kosambī, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:10.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:10.3.eng: I will answer about that which is connected with Kosambī, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:10.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:11.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:11.3.eng: I will answer about the Chapter on Legal Procedures, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:11.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:12.1.eng: I will ask about those on probation, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:12.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:12.3.eng: I will answer about those on probation, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:12.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:13.3.eng: I will answer about the gathering up, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:13.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:14.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:14.3.eng: I will answer about the settling of legal issues, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:14.4.eng: two offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:14.4.comm: The offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:15.1.eng: I will ask about minor topics, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:15.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:15.3.eng: I will answer about the minor topics, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:15.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:15.4.comm: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:16.1.eng: I will ask about resting places, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:
pli-tv-pvr6:16.1.comm: For an explanation of the rendering “resting places” for senāsana, see Appendix of Technical Terms.

pli-tv-pvr6:16.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:16.3.eng: I will answer about resting places, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:16.4.eng: three offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:16.4.comm: The serious offense, the offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:17.1.eng: I will ask about schism in the Sangha, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:17.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:17.3.eng: I will answer about schism in the Sangha, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:17.4.eng: two offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:17.4.comm: The serious offense, and the offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-pvr6:18.1.eng: I will ask about conduct, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:18.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:18.3.eng: I will answer about conduct, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:18.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:19.3.eng: I will answer about cancellation, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:19.4.eng: one offense is laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:20.1.eng: I will ask about the Chapter on Nuns, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:20.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:20.3.eng: I will answer about the Chapter on Nuns, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:20.4.eng: two offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses.
pli-tv-pvr6:20.4.comm: The offense entailing confession, and the offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-pvr6:21.1.eng: I will ask about the group of five hundred, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:21.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:21.3.eng: I will answer about the group of five hundred, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:21.4.eng: there is no offense laid down in its exalted clauses.

pli-tv-pvr6:22.1.eng: I will ask about the group of seven hundred, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:22.2.eng: how many offenses are laid down in its exalted clauses?

pli-tv-pvr6:22.3.eng: I will answer about the group of seven hundred, together with its origin stories and its detailed explanations:

pli-tv-pvr6:22.4.eng: there is no offense laid down in its exalted clauses.”

pli-tv-pvr6:23.1.eng: The section on offenses in the Khandhakas, the first, is finished.

pli-tv-pvr6:25.2.eng: Entering the rainy-season residence, invitation ceremony;

pli-tv-pvr6:25.4.eng: Robes, and that which is connected with Campā,

pli-tv-pvr6:26.1.eng: The Chapter on Kosambī, legal procedures,

pli-tv-pvr6:26.2.eng: Those on probation, the gathering up;

pli-tv-pvr6:26.3.eng: Settling of legal issues, minor topics, resting places,

pli-tv-pvr6:26.6.eng: And with the five and seven hundred.”
